name: NewFlix
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: new flix
des:
With 'NewFlix' , you'll never miss it out another tv show or movie release on Netflix. 'NewFlix' provides the titles of movies and tv shows released during the current week, up to yesterday's date. It has filtering to capabilities to allow the user to specify a genre, such as "action", "drama" or "family".

To get started today, download the app and say "Alexa, open new flix". Say "Help" for instructions.

Happy Streaming!

Disclaimer: 'NewFlix' is not affiliated with Netflix, Inc. and has not been endorsed by them in its production.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
